item.title: Just-In: Binance Announces Support To Terra LUNA Mainnet Upgrade, Price Shoots 10%
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
The world’s largest crypto exchange Binance on Monday said it will support the Terra (LUNA) network upgrade. The Terra community passed the on-chain proposal for the Phoenix software upgrade v2.4, with the majority voting to approve the upgrade. LUNA price has skyrocketed almost 10% to a high of $0.69 in the past 24 hours. Binance

The post Just-In: Binance Announces Support To Terra LUNA Mainnet Upgrade, Price Shoots 10% appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Terra Luna Classic L1TF On Guardarian Deal and Q3 Roadmap, LUNC Up 20% & USTC 50%
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
Terra Luna Classic core developer team Joint L1 Task Force (L1TF) on Monday said they are moving ahead with Q3 development plans, sharing the completion status for tasks in Q2. Developer teams to primarily work on USTC stablecoin repeg in Q3, while also working on major upgrades and reducing LUNC and USTC circulating supplies. Edward

The post Terra Luna Classic L1TF On Guardarian Deal and Q3 Roadmap, LUNC Up 20% & USTC 50% appeared first on CoinGape.
item.content:encoded:
Terra Luna Classic core developer team Joint L1 Task Force (L1TF) on Monday said they are moving ahead with Q3 development plans, sharing the completion status for tasks in Q2. item.title: Ripple Says US Banks Might Want to Use XRP After Recent Victory Against SEC
item.dc:creator: Bhushan Akolkar
item.description:
Last week, blockchain startup Ripple registered a landmark victory against the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) in its long-going battle against securities law violations. Now that Ripple’s native cryptocurrency XRP doesn’t have the tag of a ‘security’, the company is confident that U.S. banks and other financial institutions will start showing interest in the

The post Ripple Says US Banks Might Want to Use XRP After Recent Victory Against SEC appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Breaking: Australia’s Big Four Banks Block Payments To Crypto Exchanges
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
Australian authorities’ heightened crypto scrutiny has led to banks being reluctant to work with crypto exchanges and firms. National Australia Bank Ltd (NAB) has joined the country’s other leading banks such as Westpac Banking Corp., Commonwealth Bank of Australia, and Australia & New Zealand Banking Group to block payments to high-risk crypto exchanges. National Australia

The post Breaking: Australia’s Big Four Banks Block Payments To Crypto Exchanges appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Crypto Exchange Binance Completes the Integration of Bitcoin Lightning Network
item.dc:creator: Bhushan Akolkar
item.description:
In the latest announcement on Monday, July 17, crypto exchange Binance announced that it has completed the much-awaited integration of the Bitcoin Lightning Network. As a result, Binance users will now be able to leverage the Layer-2 scaling solution for Bitcoin withdrawals and deposits. item.title: LUNC Price Hints Last Pullback Opportunity Before a Leap Above $0.0001
item.dc:creator: Brian Bollinger
item.description:

item.title: Ethereum Price Return to $1800? Fake Breakout Triggers Concerns of Minor Correction
item.dc:creator: Brian Bollinger
item.description:
Ethereum Price Analysis: On July 13, the Ethereum coin price breached a weekly resistance of $1966 as a signal of uptrend continuation. However, the coin price faced immediate supply pressure at $$2000 psychological resistance and plunged below 1966. This failed breakout suggests the recent rally was driven by market sentiment and not by the coin’s
